author: Chris Noles
title: Addressing Current Security & Compliance Risks, Beyond Computer Solutions Offers Complimentary Unsupported & Unsecure Software Audit during September 2015
text:
Beyond Computer Solutions (BCS), a managed service provider (MSP) specializing in online collaborative business solutions, today announced it’s offering a complimentary Unsupported and Unsecure Software Audit for small and medium-sized businesses throughout the Greater Atlanta area. The offer ends September 30, 2015. “Even though there’s no longer support available for Windows operating systems like XP and Server 2003, many companies continue to use them for their business systems,” said Chris Noles, CEO, BCS. “Our audit, available for free during the next 30 days, will help those businesses look at their options to update unsecure business software and better protect their important information and data, as well as remain in compliance with industry and government regulations and rules. There’s no reason for anyone to gamble with their IT and put their business at risk.”
Beyond Computer Solutions focuses on providing end-to-end solutions that improve uptime, reduce security risks and provide clients with technology solutions that give them a competitive edge. To achieve these goals, BCS offers a robust portfolio of services and technologies, including hardware and software from the world’s top firms, a complete portfolio of public, private and hybrid cloud technologies, and complementary services that are flexible and meet the needs of firms of all sizes and from many industries. BCS services include a powerful Virtual CIO offering that allows clients to benefit from a technology visionary to desktop support on a fixed monthly basis.
Learn more about BCS’s complimentary Unsupported and Unsecure Software Audit by visiting http://www.beyondcs.net or calling the company at 678.799.7635.
About Beyond Computer Solutions
Beyond Computer Solutions (BCS) is an Atlanta-based managed service provider (MSP) that offers IT support solutions. Some of the company’s most popular network solutions involve computer repair, cloud computing, cloud service management, VoIP services, data recovery and remote backup. BCS provides managed IT services for a variety of industries, including medical, non-profit, financial, legal, advertising, media, among others. Beyond Computer Solutions beyondcs.com. 678.799.7635.
